location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [the entirity ] to David Leighton, Adjutant General of the Army, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Adjutant General that Lieutenant Nesbitt Strong, Commander of the Escort at the Bushire Residency, has been permitted to return to Bombay on health grounds.
